verses.verse: Now it came to pass <WH139>, when Adoni-zedek king <WH4428> of Jerusalem <WH3389> heard <WH8085> how <WH3588> Joshua <WH3091> had taken <WH3920> Ai <WH5857>, and had utterly destroyed <WH2763> it <WH6213> (as he had done to Jericho <WH3405> and her king <WH4428>, so he had done <WH6213> to Ai <WH5857> and her king <WH4428>), and how the inhabitants <WH3427> of Gibeon <WH1391> had made peace <WH7999> with Israel <WH3478>, and were among them <WH7130>;

that they feared <WH3372> greatly <WH3966>, because Gibeon <WH1391> was a great <WH1419> city <WH5892>, as one <WH259> of the royal <WH4467> cities <WH5892>, and because it was greater <WH1419> than Ai <WH5857>, and all the men <WH582> thereof were mighty <WH1368>.

Wherefore Adoni-zedek <WH139> king <WH4428> of Jerusalem <WH3389> sent <WH7971> unto Hoham <WH1944> king <WH4428> of Hebron <WH2275>, and unto Piram <WH6502> king <WH4428> of Jarmuth <WH3412>, and unto Japhia <WH3309> king <WH4428> of Lachish <WH3923>, and unto Debir <WH1688> king <WH4428> of Eglon <WH5700>, saying <WH559>,
Come up <WH5927> unto me <WH5826>, and help me <WH5221>, and let us smite Gibeon <WH1391>; for it hath made peace <WH7999> with Joshua <WH3091> and with the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

Therefore the five <WH2568> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, the king <WH4428> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, the king <WH4428> of Hebron <WH2275>, the king <WH4428> of Jarmuth <WH3412>, the king <WH4428> of Lachish <WH3923>, the king <WH4428> of Eglon <WH5700>, gathered themselves together <WH622>, and went up <WH5927>, they and all their hosts <WH4264>, and encamped <WH2583> against Gibeon <WH1391>, and made war against it <WH3898>.

And the men <WH582> of Gibeon <WH1391> sent <WH7971> unto Joshua <WH3091> to the camp <WH4264> to Gilgal <WH1537>, saying <WH559>, Slack <WH7503> not thy hand <WH3027> from thy servants <WH5650>; come up <WH5927> to us quickly <WH4120>, and save <WH3467> us <WH5826>, and help us <WH4428>: for all the kings of the Amorites <WH567> that dwell <WH3427> in the hill-country <WH2022> are gathered together against us <WH6908>.
So Joshua <WH3091> went up <WH5927> from Gilgal <WH1537>, he <WH5971>, and all the people of war <WH4421> with him <WH1368>, and all the mighty men of valor <WH2428>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, Fear <WH3372> them not <WH5414>: for I have delivered them into thy hands <WH3027>; there shall not a man <WH376> of them stand <WH5975> before thee <WH6440>.
60 <WH3091> therefore came <WH935> upon them suddenly <WH6597>; for he went up <WH5927> from Gilgal <WH1537> all the night <WH3915>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> discomfited <WH2000> them before <WH6440> Israel <WH3478>, and he slew <WH5221> them with a great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347> at Gibeon <WH1391>, and chased <WH7291> them by the way <WH1870> of the ascent <WH4608> of Beth-horon <WH1032>, and smote <WH5221> them to Azekah <WH5825>, and unto Makkedah <WH4719>.

And it came to pass <WH5127>, as they fled from before <WH6440> Israel <WH3478>, while they were at the descent <WH4174> of Beth-horon <WH1032>, that Jehovah <WH3068> cast down <WH4174> great <WH1419> stones <WH68> from heaven <WH8064> upon them unto Azekah <WH5825>, and they died <WH4191>: they were more <WH7227> who died <WH4191> with the hailstones <WH1259> than they whom <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> slew <WH2026> with the sword <WH2719>.

Then spake <WH1696> Joshua <WH3091> to Jehovah <WH3068> in the day <WH3117> when Jehovah <WH3068> delivered up <WH5414> the Amorites <WH567> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and he said <WH559> in the sight <WH5869> of Israel <WH3478>, Sun <WH8121>, stand thou still <WH1826> upon Gibeon <WH1391>; And thou <WH3394>, Moon, in the valley <WH6010> of Aijalon <WH357>.

And the sun <WH8121> stood still <WH1826>, and the moon <WH3394> stayed <WH5975>, Until the nation <WH1471> had avenged <WH5358> themselves of their enemies <WH341>. Is not this <WH1931> written <WH3789> in the book <WH5612> of Jashar <WH3477>? And the sun <WH8121> stayed <WH5975> in the midst <WH2677> of heaven <WH8064>, and hasted <WH213> not to go down <WH935> about a whole <WH8549> day <WH3117>.

And there was no day <WH3117> like that before <WH6440> it or after <WH310> it <WH3068>, that Jehovah hearkened <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of a man <WH376>: for Jehovah <WH3068> fought <WH3898> for Israel <WH3478>.
And Joshua <WH3091> returned <WH7725>, and all Israel <WH3478> with him <WH4264>, unto the camp to Gilgal <WH1537>.
And these five <WH2568> kings <WH4428> fled <WH5127>, and hid <WH2244> themselves in the cave <WH4631> at Makkedah <WH4719>.
And it was told <WH5046> Joshua <WH3091>, saying <WH559>, The five <WH2568> kings <WH4428> are found <WH4672>, hidden <WH2244> in the cave <WH4631> at Makkedah <WH4719>.
And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559>, Roll <WH1556> great <WH1419> stones <WH68> unto the mouth <WH6310> of the cave <WH4631>, and set <WH6485> men <WH582> by it to keep them <WH8104>:

but stay <WH5975> not ye <WH7291>; pursue after <WH310> your enemies <WH341>, and smite the hindmost <WH2179> of them <WH5414>; suffer them not to enter <WH935> into their cities <WH5892>: for Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430> hath delivered <WH5414> them into your hand <WH3027>.

And it came to pass <WH3091>, when Joshua and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> had made an end <WH3615> of slaying <WH5221> them with a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347>, till they were consumed <WH8552>, and the remnant <WH8300> which remained <WH8277> of them had entered <WH935> into the fortified <WH4013> cities <WH5892>,

that all the people <WH5971> returned <WH7725> to the camp <WH4264> to Joshua <WH3091> at Makkedah <WH4719> in peace <WH7965>: none moved <WH2782> his tongue <WH3956> against any <WH376> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
Then said <WH559> Joshua <WH3091>, Open <WH6605> the mouth <WH6310> of the cave <WH4631>, and bring forth <WH3318> those five <WH2568> kings <WH4428> unto me out of the cave <WH4631>.

And they did <WH6213> so <WH3318>, and brought forth those five <WH2568> kings <WH4428> unto him out of the cave <WH4631>, the king <WH4428> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, the king <WH4428> of Hebron <WH2275>, the king <WH4428> of Jarmuth <WH3412>, the king <WH4428> of Lachish <WH3923>, the king <WH4428> of Eglon <WH5700>.

And it came to pass <WH3318>, when they brought forth those kings <WH4428> unto Joshua <WH3091>, that Joshua <WH3091> called <WH7121> for all the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478>, and said <WH559> unto the chiefs <WH7101> of the men <WH582> of war <WH4421> that went <WH1980> with him <WH7126>, Come near, put <WH7760> your feet <WH7272> upon the necks <WH6677> of these kings <WH4428>. And they came near <WH7126>, and put <WH7760> their feet <WH7272> upon the necks of them <WH6677>.

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto them <WH3372>, Fear not <WH2865>, nor be dismayed; be strong <WH2388> and of good courage <WH553>: for thus shall Jehovah <WH3068> do <WH6213> to all your enemies <WH341> against whom ye fight <WH3898>.

And afterward <WH310> Joshua <WH3091> smote <WH5221> them <WH4191>, and put them to death, and hanged <WH8518> them on five <WH2568> trees <WH6086>: and they were hanging <WH8518> upon the trees <WH6086> until the evening <WH6153>.

And it came to pass at the time <WH6256> of the going down <WH935> of the sun <WH8121>, that Joshua <WH3091> commanded <WH6680>, and they took them down <WH3381> off the trees <WH6086>, and cast <WH7993> them into the cave <WH4631> wherein they had hidden <WH2244> themselves <WH7760>, and laid great <WH1419> stones <WH68> on the mouth <WH6310> of the cave <WH4631>, unto this very <WH6106> day <WH3117>.

And Joshua <WH3091> took <WH3920> Makkedah <WH4719> on that day <WH3117>, and smote <WH5221> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and the king <WH4428> thereof <WH2763>: he utterly destroyed them and all the souls <WH5315> that were therein <WH7604>; he left none remaining <WH8300>; and he did <WH6213> to the king <WH4428> of Makkedah <WH4719> as he had done <WH6213> unto the king <WH4428> of Jericho <WH3405>.
And Joshua <WH3091> passed <WH5674> from Makkedah <WH4719>, and all Israel <WH3478> with him <WH3841>, unto Libnah, and fought <WH3898> against Libnah <WH3841>:

and Jehovah <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> it also <WH4428>, and the king thereof <WH3027>, into the hand of Israel <WH3478>; and he smote <WH5221> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and all the souls <WH5315> that were therein <WH7604>; he left none remaining <WH8300> in it <WH6213>; and he did unto the king <WH4428> thereof as he had done <WH6213> unto the king <WH4428> of Jericho <WH3405>.
And Joshua <WH3091> passed <WH5674> from Libnah <WH3841>, and all Israel <WH3478> with him <WH3923>, unto Lachish, and encamped <WH2583> against it <WH3898>, and fought against it:

and Jehovah <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> Lachish <WH3923> into the hand <WH3027> of Israel <WH3478>; and he took <WH3920> it on the second <WH8145> day <WH3117>, and smote <WH5221> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and all the souls <WH5315> that were therein <WH6213>, according to all that he had done to Libnah <WH3841>.

Then Horam <WH2036> king <WH4428> of Gezer <WH1507> came up <WH5927> to help <WH5826> Lachish <WH3923>; and Joshua <WH3091> smote <WH5221> him and his people <WH5971>, until he had left <WH7604> him none remaining <WH8300>.
And Joshua <WH3091> passed <WH5674> from Lachish <WH3923>, and all Israel <WH3478> with him <WH5700>, unto Eglon; and they encamped <WH2583> against it <WH3898>, and fought against it;

and they took <WH3920> it on that day <WH3117>, and smote <WH5221> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>; and all the souls <WH5315> that were therein he utterly destroyed <WH2763> that day <WH3117>, according to all that he had done <WH6213> to Lachish <WH3923>.
And Joshua <WH3091> went up <WH5927> from Eglon <WH5700>, and all Israel <WH3478> with him <WH2275>, unto Hebron; and they fought against it <WH3898>:

and they took <WH3920> it <WH5221>, and smote it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and the king <WH4428> thereof <WH5892>, and all the cities thereof <WH5315>, and all the souls that were therein <WH7604>; he left none remaining <WH8300>, according to all that he had done <WH6213> to Eglon <WH5700>; but he utterly destroyed <WH2763> it <WH5315>, and all the souls that were therein.
And Joshua <WH3091> returned <WH7725>, and all Israel <WH3478> with him <WH1688>, to Debir, and fought against it <WH3898>:

and he took <WH3920> it <WH4428>, and the king thereof <WH5892>, and all the cities thereof <WH5221>; and they smote them with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and utterly destroyed <WH2763> all the souls <WH5315> that were therein <WH7604>; he left none remaining <WH8300>: as he had done <WH6213> to Hebron <WH2275>, so he did <WH6213> to Debir <WH1688>, and to the king <WH4428> thereof <WH6213>; as he had done also to Libnah <WH3841>, and to the king thereof <WH4428>.

So Joshua <WH3091> smote <WH5221> all the land <WH776>, the hill-country <WH2022>, and the South <WH5045>, and the lowland <WH8219>, and the slopes <WH794>, and all their kings <WH4428>: he left <WH7604> none remaining <WH8300>, but he utterly destroyed <WH2763> all that breathed <WH5397>, as Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, commanded <WH6680>.
And Joshua <WH3091> smote <WH5221> them from Kadesh-barnea <WH6947> even unto Gaza <WH5804>, and all the country <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>, even unto Gibeon <WH1391>.

And all these kings <WH4428> and their land <WH776> did Joshua <WH3091> take <WH3920> at one <WH259> time <WH6471>, because Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, fought <WH3898> for Israel <WH3478>.
And Joshua <WH3091> returned <WH7725>, and all Israel <WH3478> with him <WH4264>, unto the camp to Gilgal <WH1537>.
